About.title: What is VOTING?
About.text: We can call it the company rating app. On social media, we heard the employee's thoughts about companies who not satisfied with their company. Maybe he/she worked so hard to get that job, he did not think he/she would not be satisfied, or could not get information from the employees who work there. At this point, we wanted to help the people who want to enter their dream job. Then we prepared some questions about the working conditions of that company. Current and previous employees can rate that company so People get some idea about the company conditions.

About.title: Front-End
About.text: In this project,  We are using the React.js library.  Additionally, Routing: React Router Dom, UI: Material UI,Form Validations: Formik,Alerts: Alertify, Scroll Animations: AOS,Multi-Language Support: I18next.

About.title: Back-End
About.text: For the back end, we preferred node.js express.js mongoose and mongodb. First, we created the structure for the request and response that come with node.js. Then we performed the routing process with express. With Mongoose, we created the scheme of the data to be saved in our database. According to these schemes, we wrote the functions that will perform the saving process, then we created functions for the data we will fetch from our database and connected to the API.
